messages.subject: FREE "How to Begin Homeschooling" Seminar Thursday, August 2, 2001
messages.msgSnippet: Experienced homeschooling parents offer a FREE How to Begin Homeschooling Seminar Thursday, August 2, 2001 7-9 pm Sherwood Regional Library 2501 Sherwood Hall
messages.messageBody:
Experienced homeschooling parents offer a

FREE How to Begin Homeschooling Seminar
Thursday, August 2, 2001
7-9 pm
Sherwood Regional Library
2501 Sherwood Hall Ln., Mount Vernon

Topics include:
How to Start Homeschooling
The Virginia Home Education Law
Curriculum Options
Finding Support
Resources
Q & A
Much More

Gobs of FREE resources! Children welcome.
See map at:
http://mapquest.digitalcity.com/washington/entertainment/venuemap.dci?vid
=83575

For more information, contact Ceciliadl@...
